attributes.action: get the Queen to Dissolve Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the people of the UK who are fed up of the current government ask for the queen to dissolve parliament and save the UK.
Change needs to come now and a strong new beginning for our great country. 
This government is all about control and spying, no longer shall we put up with it. Change has to happen

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
